Soulstone of the Wolves

miscellaneous (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 390
start battle spell [startbattlespell]: #792 Howl
spell [itemspell]: #749 Call of the Wild

Requires 60N5E to forge (N6E1)

This stone is a symbol of all wolvenkin. Its bearer is considered a friend of the wolves and they will come to his aid in battle. The bearer of the Soulstone can also cast Call of the Wild once per full moon without using any magic gems.
